mapper.select: select level AS code, count(*) as count from event GROUP BY level ORDER BY level ;
select e.type_id AS code, t.name as label, count(*) as count from event as e left join event_type as t on e.type_id = t.id GROUP BY e.type_id ORDER BY e.type_id;
select e.app_code AS code, a.name as label, count(*) as count from event as e left join event_app_code as a on e.app_code = a.code GROUP BY e.app_code ORDER BY e.app_code ;
